title: Democrats Face Critical Day on Pursuing Impeachment
text:
WASHINGTON—House Democrats’ calls to impeach President Trump faced a pivotal day as lawmakers returned to Capitol Hill for the first time since reports emerged that the president pressed Ukraine to investigate Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden and his son.

House Democratic leaders plan to hold an all-caucus meeting Tuesday afternoon to discuss the Ukraine-related allegations amid growing pressure on House Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D., Calif.) to pursue removing Mr. Trump from office.

...
description: House Democrats’ calls to impeach President Trump faced a pivotal day as lawmakers returned to Capitol Hill for the first time since reports emerged that the president pressed Ukraine to investigate Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden and his son.
